bug_fix_verification.previous_bug: Login error message not displayed when login fails with invalid credentials
bug_fix_verification.fix_applied: Main agent refactored LoginPage.jsx to use custom axios instance (authAxios) without interceptors
bug_fix_verification.status: FIXED - Error message 'Invalid credentials' now displays correctly
bug_fix_verification.root_cause: Previous axios interceptor in api.js was causing 401 redirect loops, preventing error state from being displayed
